data.title: A typed letter signed by David Baltimore to The Honorable Barry O. Jones, declining an invitation to deliver the Centenary Burnet Oration
data.meta_description: Quarto, one page, on California Institute of Technology letterhead, 3 November 1998. Two horizontal creases where folded for posting; in fine condition, with the original envelope. 'Each year at the ASID Australasian Society for Infectious Diseases scientific meeting, a world-renowned expert in infectious diseases is invited to give the Macfarlane Burnet Oration, named in honour of the Nobel Prize-winning Australian virologist Sir
data.text:
Quarto, one page, on California Institute of Technology letterhead, 3 November 1998.

Two horizontal creases where folded for posting; in fine condition, with the original envelope.

Item #115554
